original_text: “You stiff-necked people! Your hearts and ears are still uncircumcised. You are just like your ancestors: You always resist the Holy Spirit!
korean_text: 목이 곧고 마음과 귀에 할례를 받지 못한 사람들아 너희도 너희 조상과 같이 항상 성령을 거스르는도다

sentences.original_text: Your hearts and ears are still uncircumcised.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 마음과 귀가 아직 할례를 받지 못하였도다.

sentences.original_text: You are just like your ancestors:
You always resist the Holy Spirit!
